mainText:
I was weaned on the "Lisa" in the 80's, grew up with the Mac in the 90's and have since been spoiled with the "i"'s - pod, pad, phone and book.   Steve Jobs made work easy, computers fun and technology intuitive.  

We are all sad today, but grateful for what he was able to do in his short time here.

My condolences to his family.
author: Lisa
